text: Constance Vera Browne (or Sally Gray; 14 February 1916 â€“ 24 September 2006) was an English actress during the 1930s and 1940s. She did mostly melodrama movies. She played herself in Cheer Up (1936). She also played Carole in Dangerous Moonlight. Gray was born in London. She died there. title: Sally Gray
